Calculator

By jonsvein Heinesen 

# Example: Digital Tick Calculator
def digital_tick_calculator(tick=0.6e-12):
    h = 6.62607015e-34  # Planck's constant in JÂ·s
    c = 299792458       # Speed of light in m/s
    E_min = h / tick    # Minimal energy quantum in J
    L_eff = c * tick    # Effective length scale in m
    return E_min, L_eff
print(digital_tick_calculator())
